metadata.dc:title: Dental management in patients with cirrhosis
metadata.dc:description: The present article provides a brief review of dental management in patients with cirrhosis. It focuses on problems related to infections, hemorrhagic events, and treatment with commonly used drugs in odontology (AU)
metadata.dc:creator: Talaván Serna, Julio
Silvestre, Francisco-Javier
Rodríguez Martínez, Sandra
metadata.dc:title: Manejo odontológico en el paciente cirrótico
